header.title: Diiwaan Gelinta Dugsi
header.description: Ku qor carruurtaada barnaamijka Islaamka ee maalinta Jimcaha

footer.needHelp: Ma u baahan tahay caawimaad? Nala soo xiriir

parentSection.title: Macluumaadka Waalidiinta
parentSection.description: Xiriirka ugu muhiimsan ee diiwaan gelinta

childrenSection.title: Carruurta
childrenSection.description: Ku dar ilmo kasta oo doonaysa inuu/ay isdiiwaangaliso

placeholders.healthInfo: Tusaale: Xasaasiyadda lowyada (EpiPen ku jirta boorsooyinka), ADHD (dawooyinka guriga ku qaata), ama 'Ma jiro'

helpText.healthInfo: La wadaag wax kasta oo xasaasiyadood ah, xaaladaha caafimaad, ADHD/Autism, dawooyinka, baahiyaha cuntada, ama xeeladaha taageerada. Qor "Ma jiro" haddii aan jirin.

messages.enrollmentSuccess: Si guul leh ayaa loo diiwaan geliyay {count} {childText}!
messages.enrollmentError: Diiwaan gelinta way fashilantay. Fadlan isku day mar labaad.
messages.unexpectedError: Khalad aan la filayn ayaa dhacay. Fadlan isku day mar labaad.

validation.nameMin: Magaca waa inuu ahaadaa ugu yaraan 2 xaraf
validation.nameMax: Magaca waa inuu ka yaraan yahay 50 xaraf
validation.nameInvalid: Magaca wuxuu ka koobmi karaa kaliya xarfaha, bannaan, iyo xarriiqaha
validation.emailMin: Iimayl waa inuu ahaadaa ugu yaraan 5 xaraf
validation.emailMax: Iimayl waa inuu ka yaraan yahay 100 xaraf
validation.healthInfoMin: Fadlan bixi macluumaadka caafimaadka ama qor 'Ma jiro'
